00059     bool VertebrateMitochondrialGenomeAlphabet::isUnresolved(int state) const
00060       {
00061         return ((uint)state > getNumberOfTypes());
00062       }
00063 
00064     bool VertebrateMitochondrialGenomeAlphabet::isUnresolved(
00065         const string &state) const
00066       {
00067         return isUnresolved(charToInt(state));
00068       }

00070     void VertebrateMitochondrialGenomeAlphabet::convertModeltoAlphabet(
00071         const ScoringModel* scm)
00072       {
00073         alphabet.resize(scm->GetModelSize()+1);        
00074         
00075         int i=1;
00076         uint size;
00077         string temp = "";
00078 
00079         for (ModelValues::const_iterator itr = scm->constitStart(); itr
00080             != scm->constitEnd(); itr++)
00081           {
00082             temp = itr->first;
00083             alphabet[i].num = i-1;
00084             alphabet[i].letter = temp;
00085             alphabet[i].abbr = temp;
00086             alphabet[i].name = temp;
00087             size = itr->second.symbol.length();
00088             i++;
00089 //            std::cout << "Chevron <" << temp << "> added" << std::endl;
00090           }
00091         //Add gap code
00092         alphabet[0].num = -1;
00093         alphabet[0].letter = string(size, '_');
00094         alphabet[0].abbr = string(size, '_');
00095         alphabet[0].name = "Gap";
00096 
00097       }
00098   }
